name: AKIN (itch)
description:
AKIN

A short 2D Platformer with a dark little background story.

You play as Vulture looking for your sister Hare, who left you hints to find and figure out where she is hiding.

Made by students of Timebased Media at the Hochschule in Mainz, Germany.

Game by Sina Hofmann, Art by Lisa Ströher, Animation by Máté Ozstermayer, Sound by Jeremias Witteler
